Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2002...
Injured on 4/30/2002 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/21/2003 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Released by New York (N) on 4/16/2015...
Drafted in 4th round, 110th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2016...
Released by Pittsburgh on 3/2/2016...
Drafted in 6th round, 146th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2019...
Injured on 5/8/2019 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Drafted in 6th round, 106th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1977...
Had first career hit on 8/9/1982, off Dick Ruthven (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/23/1983, off Jim Slaton (CHW)...
Injured on 9/16/1986 with a Broken Foot, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/1/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
